_header: O piteously may I wail and complain
_description: A poem on heraldry — in rhyme royal

Folger12323.First Lines:
O petuusly may I wayle and complayneffor lacke of connyng alas my
                    tyme ys lore…
Folger12323.Last Lines:
…Trew or false a taynted in presonAnd for your loue thes wold
                    Ionbard to raunsom
